name: Leopard
description: We have a unique ability to translate the complexities of the B2B world into content and conversations that sell. Through our experience with the software, technology and healthcare industries, we’ve helped some of the world’s leading B2B brands make the shift from selling products to consulting on solutions. From “selling” to solving. We offer the best of both worlds: a specialty agency focused on the needs of B2B and B2B2C clients, within a global network of marketing and media experts.
